name: Tappy Racer
description:
Tappy Racer is an extremely addictive and easy to understand game.
Game presents beautiful 2D graphics and one touch controls and pleasing environment.
You can touch the screen to change the direction or lane and overtake the traffic. zigzag your car through the traffic. You can choose to drive from 9 different cars.
Cars will be unlocked as you score higher. All the cars will be unlocked if you score above 50.
dash as fast as you can to get higher score and unlock more playable vehicles.
Retry as many times as you like and try to get higher score.
You can share you score with your friends on Game Center.
Features
1 Touch controls
Beautiful 2D graphics
9 different cars to choose
music and sound fx
Aa beautiful traffic race to enjoy
Multi platform also available on google play store

drive you way through the traffic and become the top traffic racer.
